items.sentence: They won't be able to do anything about that problem today.
I don't know why I even thought you might consider helping.
Leaving something unfinished is the worst thing you can do.
Can you remember the first time that you heard the Beatles?
I think a lot of people would get a lot of use out of that.
Gargle with saltwater to relieve the pain of a sore throat.
Tom and Mary gradually started spending more time together.
Whenever someone knocks on the door, my dog starts barking.
The ambulances carried the injured to the nearest hospital.
I can't believe that you didn't recognize your own brother.
